work.name: Zhou Lab at UCLA
work.summary: Working on pedestrian motion generation in urban environments.

volunteer.summary: Led a 4-week program for 30+ students to explore Machine Learning, Web Development, and Game Development. Enhanced the educational experiences of 300+ students from underserved LA high schools with technical workshops.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
